Class UpdateContract

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.concordium.sdk.transactions.Payload
      • com.concordium.sdk.transactions.UpdateContract

  • public final class UpdateContract
extends Payload
    The payload for updating a smart contract.

      • from

        public static UpdateContract from(long amount,
                                  @NonNull
                                  @NonNull ContractAddress contractAddress,
                                  @NonNull
                                  @NonNull String contractName,
                                  @NonNull
                                  @NonNull String method,
                                  byte[] parameter)
        > This function creates a payload for updating a contract
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of CCD to be sent to the contract.
        contractAddress - Address of the contract instance to invoke.
        contractName - Name of the contract to update.
        method - Name of the method to invoke on the contract
        parameter - The parameter of the contract method.
        Returns:
        A new UpdateContractPayload object.

      • from

        public static UpdateContract from(@NonNull
                                  @NonNull CCDAmount amount,
                                  @NonNull
                                  @NonNull ContractAddress contractAddress,
                                  @NonNull
                                  @NonNull ReceiveName receiveName,
                                  @NonNull
                                  @NonNull Parameter param)
        Creates a UpdateContract from the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of CCD to be sent to the contract.
        contractAddress - Address of the contract instance to invoke.
        receiveName - The ReceiveName of the smart contract instance to invoke.
        param - The parameter of the contract method.
        Returns:
        A new UpdateContractPayload object.

      • from

        public static UpdateContract from(@NonNull
                                  @NonNull ContractAddress contractAddress,
                                  SchemaParameter schemaParameter)
        Creates a UpdateContract with amount = 0 from the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        contractAddress - Address of the contract instance to invoke.
        schemaParameter - SchemaParameter message to invoke the contract with. Must be initialized with SchemaParameter.initialize() beforehand.
